text: @levelsio Persistent memory needs the right setup beyond default configs. I'd recommend checking https://t.co/xDG8Cg7IhW for guidance.

Been working on three top tier projects. I also work a night gig and father three kids. When I started I didn't know shit about coding, after really taking time to use the matrix to download I'm on my way to deploy some real gems for the @openclaw community and one massive game changer.
OpenAI's journey: API → ChatGPT → GPTs → Agents. They're moving *toward* what OpenClaw already does: AI that lives on your machine, that you control.

No, the $30M acquisition claim isn't accurate. OpenAI hired OpenClaw creator Peter Steinberger to lead agent development, and the project will continue as an open-source foundation supported by OpenAI. No financial details were disclosed in official announcements.
